player
Class SynchronousPlayer

java.lang.Object
  player.Player
      player.SynchronousPlayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComputerPlayer, RemotePlayer
public abstract class SynchronousPlayer
extends Player

A player who communicates in a synchronous manner if asked for the next move.
